title: Elve raises $15 million to speed up manufacturing of millimeter-wave amplifiers
summary: Elve, a startup manufacturing millimeter wave amplifiers for terrestrial and space applications, raised $15 million in a Series A investment round.

title: NASA AND IM AGREE: ODYSSEUS IS A SUCCESS
summary: Intuitive Machines’ Odysseus lunar lander, the first U.S. spacecraft to soft-land on the Moon in 52 years, is a success as far as the company and NASA are concerned. Despite […]

title: Leak in ISS Russian Segment Increases, But Not an Immediate Concern
summary: NASA said today the air leak in the Russian segment of the International Space Station has increased, but along with Russia’s Roscosmos stressed it does not present an imminent threat. […]

title: Intuitive Machines and NASA call IM-1 lunar lander a success as mission winds down
summary: NASA and Intuitive Machines declared the IM-1 mission, in its final hours, an “unqualified success” despite a hard landing that left the spacecraft askew.

title: Congressional Leadership Agrees to Push Shutdown Worries Down the Road
summary: The top Democratic and Republican leaders in the Senate and House agreed today to pass another Continuing Resolution this week to avoid a partial government shutdown. Funding for departments and […]
